verses.verse: You shall not raise <S%H5375><s%> a false <S%H7723><s%> report: <S%H8088><s%> put <S%H7896><s%> not your hand <S%H3027><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%> to be an unrighteous <S%H2555><s%> witness. <S%H5707><s%>

You shall not follow <S%H1961><s%> <S%H310><s%> a multitude <S%H7227><s%> to do evil; <S%H7451><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you speak <S%H6030><s%> in a cause <S%H7379><s%> to decline <S%H5186><s%> after <S%H310><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> to wrest <S%H5186><s%> judgment:
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you countenance <S%H1921><s%> a poor <S%H1800><s%> man in his cause. <S%H7379><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> you meet <S%H6293><s%> your enemy's <S%H341><s%> ox <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H176><s%> his ass <S%H2543><s%> going <S%H8582><s%> astray, <S%H8582><s%> you shall surely bring <S%H7725><s%> it back <S%H7725><s%> to him again. <S%H7725><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> you see <S%H7200><s%> the ass <S%H2543><s%> of him that hates <S%H8130><s%> you lying <S%H7257><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> his burden, <S%H4853><s%> and would forbear <S%H2308><s%> to help <S%H5800><s%> him, you shall surely help <S%H5800><s%> with him.
You shall not wrest <S%H5186><s%> the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of your poor <S%H34><s%> in his cause. <S%H7379><s%>

Keep <S%H7368><s%> you far <S%H7368><s%> from a false <S%H8267><s%> matter; <S%H1697><s%> and the innocent <S%H5355><s%> and righteous <S%H6662><s%> slay <S%H2026><s%> you not: for I will not justify <S%H6663><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> gift: <S%H7810><s%> for the gift <S%H7810><s%> blinds <S%H5786><s%> the wise, <S%H6493><s%> and perverts <S%H5557><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

Also you shall not oppress <S%H3905><s%> a stranger: <S%H1616><s%> for you know <S%H3045><s%> the heart <S%H5315><s%> of a stranger, <S%H1616><s%> seeing <S%H3588><s%> you were strangers <S%H1616><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
And six <S%H8337><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> you shall sow <S%H2232><s%> your land, <S%H776><s%> and shall gather <S%H622><s%> in the fruits <S%H8393><s%> thereof:

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> year you shall let it rest <S%H8058><s%> and lie <S%H5203><s%> still; that the poor <S%H34><s%> of your people <S%H5971><s%> may eat: <S%H398><s%> and what they leave <S%H3499><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall eat. <S%H398><s%> In like <S%H3651><s%> manner <S%H3651><s%> you shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with your vineyard, <S%H3754><s%> and with your olive grove. <S%H2132><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> your work, <S%H4639><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall rest: <S%H7673><s%> that your ox <S%H7794><s%> and your ass <S%H2543><s%> may rest, <S%H5117><s%> and the son <S%H1121><s%> of your handmaid, <S%H519><s%> and the stranger, <S%H1616><s%> may be refreshed. <S%H5314><s%>

And in all <S%H3605><s%> things that I have said <S%H559><s%> to you be circumspect: <S%H8104><s%> and make no <S%H3808><s%> mention <S%H2142><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> let it be heard <S%H8085><s%> out of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Three <S%H7969><s%> times you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2287><s%> to me in the year. <S%H8141><s%>

You shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread: (you shall eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> as I commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, in the time appointed <S%H4150><s%> of the month <S%H2320><s%> Abib; <S%H24><s%> for in it you came <S%H3318><s%> out from Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and none <S%H3808><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me empty: <S%H7387><s%>)

And the feast <S%H2282><s%> of harvest, <S%H7105><s%> the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your labors, <S%H4639><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have sown <S%H2232><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> and the feast <S%H2282><s%> of ingathering, <S%H614><s%> which is in the end <S%H3318><s%> of the year, <S%H8141><s%> when you have gathered <S%H622><s%> in your labors <S%H4639><s%> out of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Three <S%H7969><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> in the year <S%H8141><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your males <S%H2138><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall not offer <S%H2076><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> with leavened <S%H2557><s%> bread; neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the fat <S%H2459><s%> of my sacrifice <S%H2282><s%> remain <S%H3885><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

The first <S%H7225><s%> of the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> of your land <S%H127><s%> you shall bring <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%> You shall not seethe <S%H1310><s%> a kid <S%H1423><s%> in his mother's <S%H517><s%> milk. <S%H2461><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I send <S%H7971><s%> an Angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, to keep <S%H8104><s%> you in the way, <S%H1870><s%> and to bring <S%H935><s%> you into <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have prepared. <S%H3559><s%>

Beware <S%H8104><s%> of him, and obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> provoke <S%H4843><s%> him not; for he will not pardon <S%H5375><s%> your transgressions: <S%H6588><s%> for my name <S%H8034><s%> is in him.

But if <S%H518><s%> you shall indeed obey <S%H8085><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that I speak; <S%H1696><s%> then I will be an enemy <S%H340><s%> to your enemies, <S%H341><s%> and an adversary <S%H6887><s%> to your adversaries. <S%H6696><s%>

For my Angel <S%H4397><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and bring <S%H935><s%> you in to the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzites, <S%H6522><s%> and the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusites: <S%H2983><s%> and I will cut <S%H3582><s%> them off.

You shall not bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to their gods, <S%H430><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> them, nor <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> after their works: <S%H4639><s%> but you shall utterly overthrow <S%H2040><s%> them, and quite break <S%H7665><s%> down <S%H7665><s%> their images. <S%H4676><s%>

And you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and he shall bless <S%H1288><s%> your bread, <S%H3899><s%> and your water; <S%H4325><s%> and I will take <S%H5493><s%> sickness <S%H4245><s%> away from the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you.

There shall nothing <S%H3808><s%> cast <S%H7921><s%> their young, nor be barren, <S%H6135><s%> in your land: <S%H776><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of your days <S%H3117><s%> I will fulfill. <S%H4390><s%>

I will send <S%H7971><s%> my fear <S%H367><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and will destroy <S%H2000><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> you shall come, <S%H935><s%> and I will make <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> turn their backs <S%H6203><s%> to you.

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> hornets <S%H6880><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, which shall drive <S%H1644><s%> out the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> from before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

I will not drive <S%H1644><s%> them out from before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you in one <S%H259><s%> year; <S%H8141><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> desolate, <S%H8077><s%> and the beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> multiply <S%H7227><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you.

By little <S%H4592><s%> and little <S%H4592><s%> I will drive <S%H1644><s%> them out from before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, until <S%H5704><s%> you be increased, <S%H6509><s%> and inherit <S%H5157><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

And I will set <S%H7896><s%> your bounds <S%H1366><s%> from the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> even to the sea <S%H3220><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and from the desert <S%H4057><s%> to the river: <S%H5104><s%> for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> into your hand; <S%H3027><s%> and you shall drive <S%H1644><s%> them out before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.
You shall make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them, nor with their gods. <S%H430><s%>

They shall not dwell <S%H3427><s%> in your land, <S%H776><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> they make you sin <S%H2398><s%> against me: for if you serve <S%H5647><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> it will surely <S%H3588><s%> be a snare <S%H4170><s%> to you.
